enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: Provides high damage resistance to fire and reduces burning time
enchantment.minecraft.blast_protection.d: Provides high damage resistance to explosions and reduces explosion knockback
enchantment.minecraft.projectile_protect: Provides high damage resistance to projectiles
enchantment.minecraft.thorns.desc: Has a chance to deal damage back to attackers
enchantment.minecraft.smite.desc: Substantially increases damage against the undead
enchantment.minecraft.bane_of_arthropods: Substantially increases damage against arthropods such as Spiders and Silverfish
enchantment.minecraft.silk_touch.desc: Allows most blocks to drop themselves when mined
enchantment.minecraft.fortune.desc: Increases drops from certain blocks such as ores
enchantment.minecraft.flame.desc: Sets targets struck by projectiles on fire
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.desc: Arrows are not consumed when shooting
enchantment.minecraft.luck_of_the_sea.de: Increases the chance of rare loot whilst fishing
enchantment.minecraft.lure.desc: Reduces the time taken to catch fish
enchantment.minecraft.depth_strider.desc: Increases movement speed when in water
enchantment.minecraft.frost_walker.desc: Water converts to ice as the wearer walks
enchantment.minecraft.mending.desc: Repairs the enchanted item when collecting experience points
enchantment.minecraft.binding_curse.desc: The enchanted armor piece cannot be removed once equipped
enchantment.minecraft.vanishing_curse.de: The enchanted item vanishes upon death
enchantment.minecraft.sweeping.desc: Increases damage dealt by Sword sweep attacks
enchantment.minecraft.loyalty.desc: Thrown Tridents return to their thrower
enchantment.minecraft.impaling.desc: Substantially increases damage against aquatic mobs
enchantment.minecraft.riptide.desc: Allows the wielder to charge forward when using a Trident whilst wet
enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc: Tridents thrown during a thunderstorm summon lightning on hit
enchantment.minecraft.piercing.desc: Allows projectiles to pierce entities and shields
enchantment.minecraft.soul_speed.desc: Increases movement speed whilst travelling on Soul Sand or Soul Soil
enchantment.minecraft.breach.desc: Damage from attacks partially penetrate armor
enchantment.minecraft.density.desc: Increases Mace damage dealt when falling from higher blocks
enchantment.minecraft.wind_burst.desc: Successful Mace strikes when falling from higher blocks launch the wielder back into the air
text.autoconfig.item_tooltips.title: Item Tooltips
text.autoconfig.item_tooltips.option.des: Whether descriptions should be added to items with the #item_tooltips:has_description tag
Whether tooltips appear only when holding down the specified key
Whether a notice to hold the required key is added to all items with descriptions
The colour to be used for tooltip descriptions
An optional prefix to add before all tooltip descriptions
Whether the prefix should be repeated on each new line when the tooltip is wrapped
The colour to be used for tooltip prefixes
text.autoconfig.item_tooltips.option.enc: Whether item enchantments should have individual descriptions
Whether enchantments in the enchanting table should have descriptions
Whether enchantment descriptions should automatically disable if another enchantment description mod is detected
Whether enchantment descriptions appear only when holding down the specified key
Whether a notice to hold the required key is added to all enchanted items
The colour to be used for enchantment descriptions
An optional prefix to add before all enchantment descriptions. Defaults to a single space
Whether the prefix should be repeated on each new line when the tooltip is wrapped
The colour to be used for enchantment description prefixes
text.autoconfig.item_tooltips.option.too: Which key should be required to be held in order to show full tooltips. Options are SHIFT, ALT or CONTROL
Whether text should be wrapped to avoid going off the screen
A static length before which text should be wrapped. Set to -1 to disable
The percentage cap of screen width at which text will be wrapped to the next line
